alert.note: Alert for Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Tooele; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 09 at 6:09PM MST until January 09 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southeastern Davis County in northern Utah... Southwestern Morgan County in northern Utah... West central Summit County in northern Utah... Northwestern Utah County in northern Utah... East central Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 608 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 17 miles west of Corinne, or 19 miles southwest of Tremonton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 50 mph could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 320. Interstate 84 between mile markers 105 and 111. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 88 and 143. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Grantsville, Morgan, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, and North Salt Lake. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED SNOW SQUALL IMPACT...SIGNIFICANT

area.areaDesc: Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Tooele; Utah
